DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to examine what methods Dental PBRN Japan dentists adopt for diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of dental caries.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Caries Diagnosis and Caries Treatment in Dental PBRN Japan
DOC.detailed_description: We conducted a cross-sectional study consisting of a questionnaire survey in Japan. We used the same questionnaire as used in the DPBRN Study, "Assessment of Caries Diagnosis and Caries Treatment".
DOC.criteria: This study queried dentists working in outpatient dental practices who have affiliated with JDPBRN to investigate research questions and to share experiences and expertise (n = 282). Dentist who doesn't perform some measure of restorative dentistry at their practice.
